alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 11:46PM CDT until May 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Low lying areas along the river flood. At 23.0 feet, Water overtops Road 145 on the west side of the bridge over the Neosho River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
